start.text: While wandering through a forest, a woman stumbles upon a shallow pond. There, she spots a rusty sword. Curious, she picks it up and to her astonishment, it begins to speak!
start.title: The Mysterious Sword

sword_story.text: "Ah, a kind soul," the sword murmurs. "I've been waiting for someone to free me. Will you aid me in my quest to defeat the Dark Sorcerer?"
sword_story.title: A Plea from the Blade

drop_sword.text: The sword screams as it lands back into the water. Scared, the woman decides to leave the forest immediately.
drop_sword.title: A Shocking Revelation

trip_over_roots.text: In her haste, the woman trips over some hidden roots and lands face-first in a pile of leaves. A squirrel nearby seems to be laughing at the comical sight.
trip_over_roots.title: A Hasty Retreat

prep_for_battle.text: Empowered with the talking sword, the woman undergoes rigorous training. Soon, she feels ready to confront the Dark Sorcerer.
prep_for_battle.title: Preparing for the Showdown

leave_forest.text: Deciding that talking swords aren't her thing, the woman leaves the forest. Maybe she'll come back with some friends.
leave_forest.title: A Change of Heart

investigate_with_friends.text: She returns with friends, but the pond is now mysteriously empty. They all have a picnic and enjoy a sunny day instead.
investigate_with_friends.title: A Day Out With Friends

heroic_ending.text: After a fierce battle, the woman, with the sword's guidance, defeats the Dark Sorcerer, restoring peace to the land. They become legends, their story told for generations.
heroic_ending.title: The Heroic Conclusion

funny_ending.text: The woman, deciding adventuring isn't for her, opens up a small stand selling 'Genuine Talking Swords' (they don't actually talk). Business booms!
funny_ending.title: An Unexpected Business Venture

normal_life.text: The woman continues her regular life, occasionally chuckling at the memory of the 'talking' sword. It remains an unsolved mystery in her life.
normal_life.title: Back to Normalcy
